title: Bacteria
description: Bacteria is a casual game that lets you inject bacteria into creatures to create monstrous beings! Unleash your creativity as you experiment with different combinations and see what kind of monstrous results you can achieve. Inject the bacteria strategically to produce powerful and unique creatures, each with its own set of abilities and characteristics. Dive into this addictive game of bacteria manipulation and witness the evolution of your creatures into formidable monsters!
